com.tambapps.gmage.transformer

Class ColorTransformers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tambapps.gmage.transformer.ColorTransformers

  • public final class ColorTransformers
extends Object
    Class providing static functions for common color transformations

      • duoTone

        public static ColorTransformer duoTone(Color color)
        A duo tone transformer. Basically, it consits of a gray scale is followed by a logical AND with the provided color
        Parameters:
        color - the color to duo-tone with when transforming
        Returns:
        a duo-tone transformer

      • biColor

        public static ColorTransformer biColor()
        A bi-color transformer. Each gmage transformed will have pixels either black or white
        Returns:
        a bi-color transformer

      • biColor

        public static ColorTransformer biColor(int threshold)
        A bi-color transformer. Each gmage transformed will have pixels either black or white
        Parameters:
        threshold - the threshold (between 0 and 255 included) applied each pixel (using gray scale) to decide whether the color should be black or white
        Returns:
        a bi-color transformer

      • biColor

        public static ColorTransformer biColor(Color blackColor,
                                       Color whiteColor)
        A bi-color transformer. Each gmage transformed will have pixels either black color or white color
        Parameters:
        blackColor - the color to used instead of black
        whiteColor - the color to used instead of white
        Returns:
        a bi-color transformer

      • biColor

        public static ColorTransformer biColor(Color blackColor,
                                       Color whiteColor,
                                       int threshold)
        Transforms a gmage to an image having pixels only of whiteColor or blackColor The average of the RGB channels is computed. If it's greater than the threshold, the color will be replaced by the white color, otherwise the black color
        Parameters:
        blackColor - the color used for averages below the threshold
        whiteColor - the color used for averages equal or above the threshold
        threshold - the threshold
        Returns:
        a bi-color transformer

      • replaceColor

        public static ColorTransformer replaceColor(Color targetColor,
                                            Color replacedColor)
        A transformer replacing the targetColor pixels to the replacedColor
        Parameters:
        targetColor - the target color
        replacedColor - the replace color
        Returns:
        a replacing color transformer

      • replaceColor

        public static ColorTransformer replaceColor(Color targetColor,
                                            Color replacedColor,
                                            float maxDifferencePercentage)
        A transformer replacing the targetColor pixels to the replacedColor
        Parameters:
        targetColor - the target color
        replacedColor - the replace color
        maxDifferencePercentage - the max difference percentage to consider when deciding to replace color or not (between 0 and 100)
        Returns:
        a replacing color transformer

      • replaceColorIncludingDiffs

        public static ColorTransformer replaceColorIncludingDiffs(Color targetColor,
                                                          Color replacedColor,
                                                          float maxDifferencePercentage)
        A transformer replacing the targetColor pixels to the replacedColor. For each pixel, The difference between the pixel and the targetColor will be echoed when replacing color with the target color
        Parameters:
        targetColor - the target color
        replacedColor - the replace color
        maxDifferencePercentage - the max difference percentage to consider when deciding to replace color or not (between 0 and 100)
        Returns:
        a replacing color transformer
